segments.text: Hello , Lincoln Bank . Kristy speaking , how may I help you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , Kristy . Could I speak to the department that deals with credit card applications , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can deal with that , Sir . Are you interested in our personal or corporate card ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The personal card , please . Is it possible to take care of this over the phone ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , Sir , but you will need to come in to your local branch to deal with the application procedure . Come in and fill out an application form and let us have a duplicate of your ID card . You'll also need a copy of your guarantor's and he or she will need to sign the form , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK ... and what deposit do I need ? I mean , is there a minimum deposit ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You'll need to deposit 1,500 RIB initially . There will also be some small additional charges for this service .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's no problem . How long will the whole thing take ? A week ? 10 days ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It should all be sorted out within 5 working days after receipt of the required documents .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right , I'll contact my guarantor now and we'll come in within the next couple of days . Thanks very much for your help . Goodbye .
segments.speaker: S2
